data.description: <p style="margin-bottom:1.0px;margin-top:3.0px"><span style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="font-family:Verdana, sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0px"><span style="font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif">There are over 7 billion people on this planet. And by 2050, there will be 2 billion more... many moving into urban centers at an unprecedented rate. Making sure there is enough food, fiber and infrastructure for our rapidly growing world is what we're all about at John Deere. And it's why we're investing in our people and our technology like never before! Here the world's brightest minds are tackling the world's biggest challenges. If you believe one person can make the world a better place, we'll put you to work. RIGHT NOW.</span></span></span></span></p><p style="margin-bottom:1.0px;margin-top:3.0px"><span style="font-size:12.0px"><span style="font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif"> </span></span></p><p style="margin-bottom:1.0px;margin-top:3.0px"><span style="font-size:10.0px"><span style="font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif"><em>John Deere is an equal opportunity employer, including disabled &amp; veterans. </em></span></span></p><p style="margin-bottom:1.0px;margin-top:3.0px"> </p><p style="margin-bottom:1.0px;margin-top:3.0px"><span style="font-size:12.0px"><span style="font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif"><strong>Primary Location:</strong> United States (US) - Illinois - Champaign <br><strong>Function:</strong> Technology (CA)<br><strong>Title: </strong>Part-Time Student - Software Engineer - Champaign, IL - 117572 <br><strong>Onsite/Remote:</strong>Partial Remote Position</span></span></p><p style="margin-bottom:1.0px;margin-top:3.0px"> </p><p><span style="font-size:12.0px"><span style="font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif"><strong>Note: Relocation assistance is not provided.</strong></span></span></p><p> </p><p><span style="font-size:12.0px"><span style="font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif"><em>The Part-Time Student Program is primarily designed to augment the Companyâ€™s regular full-time staff and is for students who work in parallel to their school schedule <strong>YEAR-ROUND</strong>.</em></span></span></p><div><div style='padding: 10px 0px;border: 1px solid transparent;'><div style='font-size:16px;word-wrap: break-word;'><H2 style='font-size: 1em; margin: 0px'><b>Your Responsibilities</b></H2>&#13;</div><div><p> </p><p> </p><p><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;">As a <strong>Part Time Student</strong> for <strong>Deere &amp; Co WHQ</strong> located in <strong>Champaign, IL</strong>, you will:</span></p><p> </p><p><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;">As a Part-Time Student-Software Engineer located in Champaign, IL, you will build digital products that are consumed at our factories to keep the assembly lines running, and/or help with factory logistics and operations. These enterprise digital products are used by all the John Deere factories across the globe in managing their operations, including manufacturing our great products. The tools will use a modern tech stack that utilizes containerization technology, observability, and deployment pipelines that will deploy the solutions at the intelligent edge in our factories.</span></p><p> </p><p><strong><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;">VISA Sponsorship is NOT available for this position</span></strong></p></div></div><div style='padding: 10px 0px;border: 1px solid transparent;'><div style='font-size:16px;word-wrap: break-word;'><H2 style='font-size: 1em; margin: 0px'><b>What Skills You Need</b></H2>&#13;</div><div><p> </p><p> </p><p><span style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">-Ideally you will be pursuing a degree in Computer Science or Management Information Systems; others may apply </span><br /><span style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">-Graduation date of spring 2027 or later</span><br /><span style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">-Cumulative GPA of 2.8 or above</span><br /><span style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">-Available to work during the academic year 15-20 hours/weekly</span><br /><span style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">-Available to work during the summer semester 30-40 hours/weekly</span><br /><span style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">-Must be able to commute to the work location in Champaign, Illinois, on a weekly basis year-round (NOTE: Relocation assistance is not provided.)</span><br /><span style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">-Experience with at least one programming language (ie: C#, Python, Java, or JavaScript)</span><br /><span style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">-Experience with a relational database management system (ie: MySQL, Postgres, SQL Server, or Oracle DB)</span><br /><span style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">-Experience creating APIs/web services and front-end development</span><br /><span style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">-Ability and willingness to learn additional skills and grow on the job</span></p><p> </p><p> </p></div></div><div style='padding: 10px 0px;border: 1px solid transparent;'><div style='font-size:16px;word-wrap: break-word;'><H2 style='font-size: 1em; margin: 0px'><b>What Makes You Stand Out</b></H2>&#13;</div><div><p> </p><p> </p><p><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;">-Experience building applications in ReactJS with Redux</span><br /><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;">-Experience with source code management tools like GitHub </span><br /><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;">-Experience with Continuous Integration/Continuous Deployment using Jenkins, Drone, Azure DevOps, or GitHub Actions</span><br /><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;">-Experience with Amazon Web Services or Microsoft Azure</span><br /><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;">-Understanding of Agile software development approach</span></p><p> </p><p> </p></div></div></div><p style="margin-bottom:1.0px;margin-top:3.0px"><span style="font-size:12.0px"><span style="font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif">At John Deere, you are empowered to create a career that will take you to where you want to go while working in an inclusive team environment. Here, you'll enjoy the freedom to explore new projects, the support to think outside the box and the advanced tools and technology that foster innovation and achievement. Additionally, we offer a comprehensive reward package to help you get started on your new career path, including:</span></span></p><ul><li><span style="font-size:12.0px"><span style="font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif">Flexible work arrangements</span></span></li><li><span style="font-size:12.0px"><span style="font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif">Highly competitive base pay and performance bonuses</span></span></li><li><span style="font-size:12.0px"><span style="font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif">Savings &amp; Retirement benefits (401K and Defined Benefit Pension)</span></span></li><li><span style="font-size:12.0px"><span style="font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif">Healthcare benefits with a generous company contribution in the Health Savings Account</span></span></li><li><span style="font-size:12.0px"><span style="font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif">Adoption assistance</span></span></li><li><span style="font-size:12.0px"><span style="font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif">Employee Assistance Programs</span></span></li><li><span style="font-size:12.0px"><span style="font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif">Tuition assistance</span></span></li><li><span style="font-size:12.0px"><span style="font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif">Fitness subsidies and on-site gyms at specific Deere locations</span></span></li><li><span style="font-size:12.0px"><span style="font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif">Charitable contribution match</span></span></li><li><span style="font-size:12.0px"><span style="font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif">Employee Purchase Plan &amp; numerous discount programs for personal use</span></span></li></ul><p style="margin-bottom:1.0px;margin-left:3.0px;margin-top:3.0px">$15 - $40 hourly based on published rates for business function and education level.</p><p style="margin-bottom:1.0px;margin-left:3.0px;margin-top:3.0px"> </p><p style="margin-bottom:1.0px;margin-left:3.0px;margin-top:3.0px"><span style="font-size:12.0px"><span style="font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif">Follow this link to learn more about our Total Rewards Package <a href="https://bit.ly/3XCd8fL"><span style="color:blue">https://bit.ly/3XCd8fL</span></a> </span></span></p><p style="margin-bottom:1.0px;margin-top:3.0px"> </p><p style="margin-bottom:1.0px;margin-top:3.0px">Must be 18 years of age or older to apply</p><p style="margin-bottom:1.0px;margin-top:3.0px"> </p><p style="margin-bottom:1.0px;margin-top:3.0px"><span style="font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="font-size:7.0pt">The information contained herein is not intended to be an exhaustive list of all responsibilities and qualifications required of individuals performing the job. The qualifications detailed in this job description are not considered the minimum requirements necessary to perform the job, but rather as guidelines.</span></span></span></p><p style="margin-bottom:1.0px;margin-top:3.0px"> </p><p style="margin-bottom:1.0px;margin-top:3.0px"><span style="font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="font-size:7.0pt">The terms of the applicable benefit plans, and all company actions administering or interpreting these plans, continue to control. Deere &amp; Company reserves the right to suspend, amend, modify, or terminate the Plan(s) in any manner at any time, including the right to modify or eliminate any cost-sharing between the company and participants. Changes, which can be made at any time, are made by action of the company's board of directors, or to the extent authorized by resolution of its board of directors, or by the Deere &amp; Company Compensation Committee. In the event of a conflict between the language of the official Plan Documents and this document, the language of the official Plan Documents will control.</span></span></span></p><p style="margin-bottom:1.0px;margin-top:3.0px"> </p><p style="margin-bottom:1.0px;margin-top:3.0px"> </p><p style="margin-bottom:1.0px;margin-top:3.0px"><span style="font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="font-size:7.0pt">ACA Section 1557 Nondiscrimination Notice</span></span></span></p><p style="margin-bottom:1.0px;margin-top:3.0px"><span style="font-size:9.0px"><span style="font-family:Aptos, sans-serif"><em>The John Deere Health Benefit Plans for Salaried Employees and The John Deere Benefit Plan for Wage Employees comply with applicable Federal civil rights laws and do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, sex, age, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, status as a protected veteran, or status as a qualified individual with disability.</em></span></span></p>
